mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.eacct_no AS "eacctNo", a.amount AS "amount", a.channel_flow_no AS "channelFlowNo", a.bank_flow_no AS "bankFlowNo", a.recv_account AS "recvAccount", a.recv_account_name AS "recvAccountName", a.recv_account_bank AS "recvAccountBank", a.usage AS "usage", a.platform_summary AS "platformSummary", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad_shanghai_bank_charge_record( eacct_no, amount, channel_flow_no, bank_flow_no, recv_account, recv_account_name, recv_account_bank, usage, platform_summary, update_date, create_date ) VALUES ( #{eacctNo}, #{amount}, #{channelFlowNo}, #{bankFlowNo}, #{recvAccount}, #{recvAccountName}, #{recvAccountBank}, #{usage}, #{platformSummary}, now(), now() )
